title: The Contests: A Homoerotic SPH Saga
description: The saga of poor straight small-dicked Caleb, told in three stories of public First the Renfair Kilt Contest, where his shortcomings are exposed to everyone and he must worship the big cock of the winner. His wicked friends, who decide to humble him by presenting his small penis to as many people as possible, force him to enter a Halloween Contest, where thanks to his friends, his costume gets more revealing as the night goes on, then finally a Small Penis Contest, where if Caleb wins, he might escape the torments of his so-called friends. Lots of homoerotic small penis humiliation and sex abounds.
author: Hymen Cleverpants
